content.question: The figure shows three circuits constructed from identical batteries and identical resistors, each of resistance <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math>. Which of the following correctly ranks the currents <math alttext="I sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="I sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="I sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math> produced by the batteries in circuits <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, and <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="I sub 1 is greater than I sub 3, which is greater than I sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="I sub 2 is greater than I sub 1, which is greater than I sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="I sub 2 is greater than I sub 3, which is greater than I sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="I sub 3 is greater than I sub 1, which is greater than I sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="I sub 2 is greater than I sub 3, which is greater than I sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
